__e: -Look, the guy's here with your stuff.
- Yeah, yeah. Go take care of your gut.
Listen to me, tomorrow morning at the sunrise grab all your things and your family and get lost from here.
I'm sure that's not the only thing that's gone limp in your hand.
What's 10 min when you hold the fate of millions in your hands?
Why don't you take your hands off of me and be a gentleman like your friend here?
You told me she got dumped by "lots of guys, lots," your words.
Thy words make no sense, but from thy tone I hath reason to worry.
